source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Beginners Guide | 3D Designing with Open Source Software
items.headline: High-quality tutorials providing you with important stuff, leading to amazing results in 3D designing with OpenSCAD.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to setup & install OpenSCAD on their computer.
Students will learn how to exactly use, save & create projects in OpenSCAD.
Students will learn how to create & design various objects in OpenSCAD.

items.title: Learn to Create 3d Cloth and Fabrics with Marvelous Designer

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Explore the interface and learn the basics of this power cloth and fabric-making software!
objectives_summary: Learn the interface and functions of Marvelous Designer
Apply your skills to create a shirt, bed sheets, comforter, and a pillow in 3d

items.title: 3D Character Creature Model creation for a Game
items.headline: Lecture series on making a Hydra for a video game.
objectives_summary: Understand the overall process of creating a Hydra for a Game Engine.
Learn how to take advantage of tools like Zspheres.
Gain insight into the thought process of a 3D artist who has made assets for games.

items.title: INTERIOR DESIGN CHALLENGE with 3DsMax VRay Photoshop
items.headline: Learn efficiently design, light and render small interior spaces
objectives_summary: Lighting and Rendering of interior spaces with 3Ds Max and VRay
Applying professional post production that makes 3D look like real photo
Have a chance to work directly with Authorized VRay Trainer - Get Feedback from a PRO!

items.title: Wheel-Thrown Pottery III, Advance Techniques
items.headline: Wheel-Thrown Pottery
objectives_summary: Understanding of advance technical processes, concepts and practices of pottery wheel based art.

items.title: Substance Painter - Basics of PBR texturing (character)
items.headline: Learn how to paint a 3D character within an industry standard software
objectives_summary: 3D texturing
Texture alpha blending
PBR material creation

items.title: Learn anime drawing ( for beginners )
items.headline: Draw Anime faces, Anime characters and Anime girl in different looks, Draw different hand shapes and simple anime eyes
objectives_summary: You will learn to draw Anime faces
You will learn to draw male anime face
You will learn to draw female Anime face

items.title: Tips and Tricks using DigiCel FlipBook Lite.
items.headline: Flipbook animation with the optional use of Autodesk Sketchbook Pro
objectives_summary: How to have fun using DigiCel FlipBook Lite animation software to animate a line and character.
The process of making an animated line drawing a circle.
How to make an animated line writing an eye catching word.

items.title: CREATING WHITEBOARD ANIMATION USING INKSCAPE & VIDEOSCRIBE
items.headline: Learn how to interpret script, do animatics, create custom inkscape vectors and animate professionally using Videoscribe
objectives_summary: You will learn how to beat and interpret a script, in order to know the vectors needed for the whiteboard animation
You will learn how to create your own vectors from the scratch, to suit your style
You will learn animatic (how to easily match your animation and the voice over timing, to make them go together)

items.title: Cinema 4D MasterClass - A Beginner's Guide for Animation
items.headline: Learn Cinema 4D from scratch. All the tools, tips & tricks. Focus on practical & fast workflows. Cinema 4D Made Easy!
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of Cinema 4D - Getting started in Cinema 4D, Menus, Object Types, Project Settings etc
Modelling - Modelling tools and how they work, good modelling practices
Lighting - Light types & how to lighting a with a purpose

items.title: Design For 3D Printing | Blender Masterclass
items.headline: An online video course that teaches you everything you need to know to design and 3d print practically anything.
objectives_summary: Learn the skills you need to design your own models for 3d printing using Blender, a powerful 3d modeling software application that is free and open source.
Bring your ideas into the physical world by designing in Blender for 3d printing.
Render your designs using Blender's advanced render engines to visualize your projects before you print.

items.title: Workshop 3ds max With Corona From Zero to Advance
items.headline: step by step Interior scene for begining .
objectives_summary: This course will teach you how to use 3DsMax by Corona Plugin,

In the content of the tutorial, the program will cover everything from the beginning of the program to the step by step, like having a trainer to teach one-on-one to beautiful the image with Photoshop.
1. Important and necessary setting techniques for making programs including installing various scripts.
